dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
xxHash is an Extremely fast Hash algorithm, running at RAM speed limits.
It successfully completes the SMHasher test suite which evaluates
collision, dispersion and randomness qualities of hash functions. Code
is highly portable, and hashes are identical on all platforms (little /
big endian).
dependencies.name: xxhash

dependent_to.description: Python tools for GATE, see https://github.com/OpenGATE/Gate
dependent_to.name: gatetools

dependent_to.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.
dependent_to.name: py-datasets

dependent_to.description: Import, export, process, analyze and view triangular meshes
dependent_to.name: py-trimesh

dependent_to.description: scalable pythonic model fitting for high energy physics
dependent_to.name: py-zfit

description: xxhash is a Python binding for the xxHash library by Yann Collet.
name: py-xxhash

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
